mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.elementname AS "elementname", a.pdfelementname AS "pdfelementname", a.company_id AS "company.id", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.use_flag AS "useFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", o4.name AS "company.name", o5.name AS "office.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_modelement( id, elementname, pdfelementname, company_id, office_id, use_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{elementname}, #{pdfelementname}, #{company.id}, #{office.id}, #{useFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_modelement SET elementname = #{elementname}, pdfelementname = #{pdfelementname}, company_id = #{company.id}, office_id = #{office.id}, use_flag = #{useFlag}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
